QuestData.Title: Restoring the Balance
QuestData.Description: The situation at the islands remains dire, $n.$B$BThe Slitherscale saurok have not responded to our attempts at peace, so only one option remains.$B$BIn order to protect the wild cloud serpents, we must rid the island of their presence. Only then can the cloud serpents be left to live in peace.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 8 Slitherscale Rippers or Slitherscale Eggdrinkers.
